basic.description: This course is an introduction to the key theories, concepts, principles, and methodology relevant to the development of biomedical engineering professional ethics. The student is facilitated in his/her development of a code of professional ethics through written work, class discussion, and case analysis.
basic.subject: BME
basic.title: Biomedical Engineering Ethics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: BME 4404C, ECH 3274L, ECH 3418, and ECH 4267.
